positive_examples: This is an example of subduing.
We observed subduing in this context.
A typical case of subduing would involve these features.
The concept of subduing applies here.
The act of bringing under control through conquest, suppression, or overwhelming force.
negative_examples: This is an example of capturing, not subduing.
This represents achieving control in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Capturing, or other types of AchievingControl

definition: The act of bringing under control, typically by force or authority.
